title: 10-night Fly & Tour: Vietnam Express Southbound
inclusions_evidence: Economy class flights from Auckland to Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City, with Singapore Airlines
Accommodation: Hotel (7 nights), Overnight boat (1 night), Overnight sleeper train (1 night)

flights.assumed_route: Auckland to Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City

other.notes: Costs for meals and additional activities are estimated.

reasoning: The travel agency deal is significantly cheaper than the DIY option, offering a comprehensive package including flights, accommodation, and meals.
